results.title: Bioinformatics Analysis of Common Differential Genes of Viral Myocarditis and Dilated Cardiomyopathy: Screening for Potential Pharmacological Compounds
results.text_hl: These genes can be considered as genetic markers of early high-risk @DISEASE_Myocarditis @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@myocarditis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is a potential viable drug in preventing the progression of @DISEASE_Virus_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014777 @@@VMC@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@DCM@@@.

results.title: Olmesartan, but not amlodipine, improves endothelium-dependent coronary dilation in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@Olmesartan@@@, but not @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, improves endothelium-dependent @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@coronary dilation@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Beneficial effect of myocardial angiogenesis on cardiac remodeling process by amlodipine and MCI-154.
results.text_hl: The present study examined the effect of long-term treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_MCI_154 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052228 @@@MCI-154@@@ (a Ca2+ sensitizer) on progressive @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunction@@@ and microvasculature in the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathic@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@DCM@@@) @SPECIES_10034 @@@hamster@@@ heart.

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on morbidity and mortality in severe chronic heart failure. Prospective Randomized Amlodipine Survival Evaluation Study Group.
results.text_hl: The possibility that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ prolongs survival in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with nonischemic @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@ requires further study.

results.title: Improvement in the histopathology of hearts from cardiomyopathic BIO TO-2 hamsters following long-term administration of amlodipine and cilnidipine.
results.text_hl: The effect of long-term administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ was examined on the histopathology and @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@1,4-dihydropyridine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@DHP@@@) calcium channel antagonist receptors in the left ventricle of @CELLLINE_CVCL:A628 @@@BIO TO-2@@@ @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@, a model of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@DCM@@@).

results.title: Chronic effects of enalapril and amlodipine on cardiac remodeling in cardiomyopathic hamster hearts.
results.text_hl: From the ages of 5 through 20 weeks, @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathic@@@ @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@, BIO53.58 (@CELLLINE_CVCL:5765 @@@BIO@@@), and control @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@, F1b, orally received either @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Calcium channel blocker-induced protection against cardiovascular damage.
results.text_hl: However, a recent clinical trial demonstrated a favorable effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on survival rates in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ resulting from nonischemic @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.

results.title: Beneficial effects of amlodipine in a murine model of congestive heart failure induced by viral myocarditis. A possible mechanism through inhibition of nitric oxide production.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Although calcium channel blockers have not been shown to be beneficial for the treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, a recent clinical trial demonstrated a favorable effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on the survival of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ resulting from nonischemic @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.

results.title: Amlodipine releases nitric oxide from canine coronary microvessels: an unexpected mechanism of action of a calcium channel-blocking agent.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Recent studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ may reduce mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, especially those with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.
